entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8 except minus 13 inland.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 near midnight. Low minus 8 except minus 13 inland. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023
